Text: Please seed folks. Thanks. BTW, you should really see this in 3D before you watch this rip. It's awesome in 3D. I saw it Saturday morning and I was completely blown away. Enjoy!
What is the Quality of the Audio and Video?
You can look at the screens and judge for yourself. The audio is decent.
The screens don't show too much. The file is yours so you have a say.

Will not sync on my Zune, its just the MPEG I guess cause some of them will work and some will not. I just downloaded Where the Wild Things Are and it was the same file type and synced right on my zune so its not the file type

Really a 1.43GB video file for the PSP or any handheld is over kill.  There is no reason for ANY movie file on a handheld to be over 600 to 700GB tops.  With that said the movie looks great (obviously) but is far to big to keep on an iPhone or PSP for very long since it takes up too much space

Jookycola - I like the quality of a 640x480 WS rip instead of 480x272. Besides, I have an 8GB mem card and getting a 16GB soon. Not too big if you have room. Besides, I archive all of my PSP movies on an external HDD. To each his/her own I guess. Glad you liked the rip.
You can get card for your PSP that holds 2 Micro SD cards.I have one.
